Articles.Content:
Recently overcame my hesitance to spend my $23 on a beta game. It just kept piquing my interest to much! So I took the plunge!

My first rocket:

Made it to space, but was sub-orbital

My Second rocket:

There was so much fuel even a Kerbal couldn't have failed to establish orbit! Yes I made it!

I've been addicted ever since and just been waiting for the Forums to come alive to post my first hello!

(The anti-spam filter tried it's best to keep me away, being all horrible and accusing me of being a spammer! Yes I did even create a new email account, *just in case* I was black listed by email.. No reason to be, but I finally managed to get registered!)

Perhaps it was my fake DOB of 1/1/1908 that was causing an issue?

Anyway, hello to all the other more established KSP addicts!

Rob

Perhaps it was my fake DOB of 1/1/1908 that was causing an issue?

Your age and wisdom will be a valuable addition to the forum sir. Welcome!

haa haa! Thanks for the welcome, sorry for the first double post.

Cheers

Rob
